pullRequest.title: Add option to take a screenshot when kicking a user from clan chat

nodes.bodyText:
Remove this extra newline

  
    
      
        Suggested change

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		description = "Configures whether or not screenshots are automatically taken when you kick a user from a clan chat.",
          
          
            
            		description = "Take a screenshot when you kick a user from a clan chat.",
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -198,11 +198,23 @@ default boolean screenshotUntradeableDrop()
 		return false;
 	}
 
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "kick",
+		name = "Screenshot Kicks from CC",
+		description = "Configures whether or not screenshots are automatically taken when you kick a user from a clan chat.",

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	default boolean screenshotKick()

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -198,11 +198,23 @@ default boolean screenshotUntradeableDrop()
 		return false;
 	}
 
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "kick",
+		name = "Screenshot Kicks from CC",
+		description = "Configures whether or not screenshots are automatically taken when you kick a user from a clan chat.",
+		position = 15
+	)
+	default boolean screenshotKick()

nodes.bodyText:
This is over 200 cols long now... Let's break it onto new lines per condition.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		if (event.getType() != ChatMessageType.GAMEMESSAGE && event.getType() != ChatMessageType.SPAM && event.getType() != ChatMessageType.TRADE && event.getType() != ChatMessageType.FRIENDSCHATNOTIFICATION)
          
          
            
            		if (event.getType() != ChatMessageType.GAMEMESSAGE
          
          
            
            			&& event.getType() != ChatMessageType.SPAM
          
          
            
            			&& event.getType() != ChatMessageType.TRADE
          
          
            
            			&& event.getType() != ChatMessageType.FRIENDSCHATNOTIFICATION)
This should be nulled on plugin shutDown
A date is added to the screenshot by default in ImageCapture, don't add an extra date.
A space is added after the given filename in ImageCapture. Don't add one here.

Use the full chat message that's given:
Your request to kick/ban this user was successful.
Not sure if it matters here the filename will be Kick  if there is no name.
